snippet: The ruling vacates decision by SUNY trustees and requires public deliberations before they vote again on closing the financially ailing hospital in Brooklyn.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Johnny L Baynes rules that trustees of the State University of New York violated state’s Open Meetings Law in voting to close Long Island College Hospital in the Cobble Hill section of Brooklyn; ruling comes in response to petition by two health care workers' unions and a group of doctors who are fighting to keep hospital open.
lead_paragraph: The ruling vacates decision by SUNY trustees and requires public deliberations before they vote again on closing the financially ailing hospital in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Judge Rules Against SUNY Trustees in Vote to Shutter Long Island College Hospital
headline.main: Judge Rules Against SUNY Trustees in Their Vote to Shutter Long Island College Hospital
